synopsis.text:
The stage is set in the 24th century, where Bimajo, Tsubuyakky, and Suzukky lead double lives! By day, they're diligent employees at the History Paradise Company, a renowned publisher of textbooks. But when night falls, they transform into the notorious Akudarma trio, a cunning group that continually thwarts the historical investigations of the JKK officers.

Following a grueling battle with JKK's finest, Tokio and Calen, our trio finds themselves on an unpaid, yet oddly lengthy break. However, their monotonous routine is shattered when their enigmatic boss assigns them a new mission: to retrieve the enigmatic Dynamonds from influential historical figures.

With no choice but to comply, Akudarma embarks on a thrilling journey through time, determined to claim the Dynamonds. As they navigate the complexities of history, the trio's quest for revenge unfolds with renewed vigor.

Meanwhile, Tokio and Calen, our unsung heroes, continue their duties, adding an intriguing layer to this temporal saga. Will the Akudarma trio successfully collect the Dynamonds and take center stage, or will Tokio and Calen rise to the challenge? Prepare for a historical adventure like no other!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
